attributes.action: MAKE IT ILLEGAL FOR PEOPLE TO SELL CONCERT TICKETS FOR MORE THAN FACE VALUE
attributes.additional_details: I TRIED TO BUY ONE DIRECTION TICKETS FOR MY DAUGHTER BUT THE SHOW SOLD OUT IN MINUTES AS A RESULT WE COULD NOT GET ANY. I WENT ON A FEW TICKET SITES AFTER THEY WERE ALL SOLD OUT ON LEGITIMATE SITES TO FIND £30 TICKETS WERE BEING SOLD FOR BETWEEN £80 TO £200. THIS NEEDS TO STOP AS GENUINE FANS CANT GET FACE VALUE TICKETS.
